Module fi.tuni.environmentaldatalogger
Package fi.tuni.environmentaldatalogger.apis

Class ApiCache

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.environmentaldatalogger.apis.ApiCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loadable, Saveable
public class ApiCache extends Object implements Saveable, Loadable
A fairly crude caching solution for API data. Thread-safe.

    • insert

      public void insert(Coordinate location, TreeMap<String,TreeMap<LocalDateTime,Double>> data)
      Inserts data into cache.

    • get

      public TreeMap<LocalDateTime,Double> get(Coordinate location, String param, javafx.util.Pair<LocalDateTime,LocalDateTime> range, Duration margin, Duration resolution)
      Returns data from cache. Returns null if the cache does not contain data for the whole range (even if part of it is available).
      Parameters:
      location - location to get data for
      param - parameter to get data for
      range - range of data to get
      margin - margin include in addition to the range
      resolution - resolution required for the data
      Returns:
      data from cache

      public boolean loadFromJson(String json)

      Parameters:
      json - JSON string
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise
